items.title: Yes, We Need Deportations Without Due Process
items.description: Only self-deportations will move the needle.

items.title: The First Amendment Isn’t Divided Against Itself
items.description: The Supreme Court should recognize the harmony of religious non-establishment and free exercise by allowing Oklahoma’s Catholic charter school.

items.title: Does Pope Francis Have You Weeping?
items.description: His underappreciated plea for prayer and charity — and real love.

items.title: Harvard Does the Right Thing — Inadvertently
items.description: If the Trump administration’s big stick provokes a complacent Harvard into seeking more independence, that will be a good thing.

items.title: Up north and down here, &c.
items.description: On the Canadian election today and U.S. elections past; a Georgian violinist; Central Park in bloom; and more.
